医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示肺结核幸存者的持久肺损伤今年在西班牙巴塞罗那举行的 ESCMID 全球大会（前身为 ECCMID）（4 月 27 日至 30 日）上提出的新研究发现了令人信服的证据，表明结核病 (TB) 可以对已成功治疗肺结核 (TB) 的个体的肺部产生持久影响。疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-reveals- permanent-lung-damage-in-tuberculosis-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Study-reveals- permanent-lung-damage-in-tuberculosis-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ecfb5c3-0516-48fc-b772-9fa326cf4c87 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 12:40:09 -0400 Study reveals lasting lung damage in tuberculosis survivors
研究表明微小的 DNA 环是癌症形成的关键驱动因素斯坦福大学医学院研究人员领导的一项国际研究表明，违背公认的遗传学定律的微小 DNA 环是癌症形成的关键驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Tiny-DNA-circles-are-key-drivers-of-cancer-formation-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Tiny-DNA-circles-are-key-drivers-of-cancer-formation-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b9ca7d5-0feb-4000-a5f2-d37006261337 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 12:32:36 -0400 Tiny DNA circles are key drivers of cancer formation, study suggests
纽约大学朗格尼分校在美国取得了最高质量的肾和肺移植结果根据联邦质量数据，纽约大学朗格尼移植研究所在 2023 年实现了全国最高质量的肾脏和肺移植结果，而其心脏和肝脏移植项目去年达到了新的高度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/NYU-Langone-achieves-highest-quality-kidney-and-lung-transplant-results-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/NYU-Langone-achieves-highest-quality-kidney-and-lung-transplant-results-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e137a560-f3a1-4b46-953f-caa4f918af75 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 12:26:32 -0400 NYU Langone achieves highest-quality kidney and lung transplant results in the U.S.
突破性的大脑刺激器可能会彻底改变神经系统疾病的治疗莱斯大学的工程师开发出了最小的植入式大脑刺激器，并在人类患者身上进行了演示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Breakthrough-brain-stimulator-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-neurological-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Breakthrough-brain-stimulator-could-revolutionize-treatment-for-neurological-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95e67bf6-954b-4dfc-b3af-55ce49a53eb8 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 12:22:14 -0400 Breakthrough brain stimulator could revolutionize treatment for neurological disorders
LabVantage 在 2024 财年软件部署数量创下纪录，庆祝客户的成功https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/LabVantage-celebrates-customer-success-with-record-number-of-software-deployments-in-FY-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/LabVantage-celebrates-customer-success-with-record-number-of-software-deployments-in-FY-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3927d367-def8-4b80-99f4-9f11aac5d295 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 10:14:00 -0400 LabVantage celebrates customer success with record number of software deployments in FY 2024
适量摄入维生素 E、C 和 β-胡萝卜素可降低 2 型糖尿病风险研究人员回顾了维生素 C 和 E 以及 β-胡萝卜素对 2 型糖尿病风险的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Moderate-vitamin-EC-and-ceb2-carotene-intake-reduces-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Moderate-vitamin-EC-and-ceb2-carotene-intake-reduces-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03b98769-ac3a-4558-ba63-5c1b12d5e8ec Mon, 15 Apr 2024 08:57:00 -0400 Moderate vitamin E, C, and β-carotene intake reduces type 2 diabetes risk
了解妊娠剧吐：原因、诊断和治疗怀孕期间严重的孕吐，医学上称为妊娠剧吐，会对母婴健康产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Understanding-hyperemesis-gravidarum-Causes-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Understanding-hyperemesis-gravidarum-Causes-diagnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c1ea086-d6e4-4626-ac9d-f4d8a273e04f Mon, 15 Apr 2024 07:52:33 -0400 Understanding hyperemesis gravidarum: Causes, diagnosis, and treatment
荷兰与世卫组织在全球卫生议程中建立更牢固的伙伴关系世卫组织和荷兰于 2024 年 4 月 10 日在海牙举行会议，讨论荷兰全球卫生战略与世卫组织关键战略目标之间的共同优先事项和一致性，标志着双方长期伙伴关系的新里程碑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Netherlands-and-WHO-forge-stronger-partnership-in-global-health-agenda.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Netherlands-and-WHO-forge-stronger-partnership-in-global-health-agenda.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69f3926c-b590-410f-980b-8c45d2d4ee1e Mon, 15 Apr 2024 07:37:37 -0400 Netherlands and WHO forge stronger partnership in global health agenda
尼日利亚率先推出新型 Men5CV 脑膜炎疫苗尼日利亚迈出了历史性一步，成为世界上第一个推出世界卫生组织（WHO）推荐的新疫苗（称为Men5CV）的国家，该疫苗可以保护人们免受五种脑膜炎球菌菌株的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Nigeria-first-to-rollout-new-Men5CV-vaccine-against-meningitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/Nigeria-first-to-rollout-new-Men5CV-vaccine-against-meningitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f5dd6de-de96-467f-a8f7-99171991eff8 Mon, 15 Apr 2024 07:31:56 -0400 Nigeria first to rollout new Men5CV vaccine against meningitis
当流氓经纪人改变人们的 ACA 政策时，税务意外就会随之而来报税季从来都不是有趣的。但今年的一些报税者面临着一个额外的复杂情况：他们的纳税申报表被拒绝，因为他们未能提供有关平价医疗法案承保范围的信息，他们甚至不知道自己拥有这一信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/When-rogue-brokers-switch-peoplee28099s-ACA-policies-tax-surprises-can-follow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240415/When-rogue-brokers-switch-peoplee28099s-ACA-policies-tax-surprises-can-follow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e96fe519-8947-47a8-9e24-70282c1d059e Mon, 15 Apr 2024 06:58:03 -0400 When rogue brokers switch people’s ACA policies, tax surprises can follow
